name: Building Games with Dojo
description: Build your first Dojo game. We'll guide participants through the setup, framework, and steps to building a fully onchain game with the Dojo engine. By the end of the session, you'll have your own game deployed to a live Katana instance for play-testing.

speakers.name: Tarrence
speakers.bio: Tarrence is the founder of Cartridge and leads the development of Dojo, an engine for onchain games and Autonomous Worlds.
